article_title: Mark L. Hopkins: Presidential power in our democracy
article_text:
By Mark L. Hopkins

More Content Now

Posted May 9, 2016 at 10:57 AM

Updated May 9, 2016 at 11:03 AM

article_metadata.description: Every four years time seems to stop while we sift through a legion of candidates who might fit our vision for what a president of the United States of America should be. Considering the expectations we have for the holder of the highest office in the land, it would be swell if he/she could walk on water and leap tall buildings with a single bound.We have to remember that a U.S. president is not a king or a dictator. He/she may favor restricting certain religions from entering the country,
article_metadata.author: Mark L. Hopkins More Content Now
